item.title: How to Create a macOS Big Sur ISO Disk Image
item.description: This post is more or less a reminder for myself how to create a macOS disk image. The created ISO image can be used with VM ware Fusion, VM ware Workstations, or used to make a bootable USB installer. Download macOS Big Sur macOS Big Sur elevates the most advanced desktop operating system in the world to a new level of power and beauty. Experience Mac to the fullest with a refined new design.
